title: Tabun「たぶん」
lyrics: Tone Nam Nam ida nagasu koto suran suran ai mama Sugo shita hibi no ato h itotsu mo no kosaz u ni Sayonara da   Hi Hi tori de mukaeta as mukaeta as a ni Na Na rihibiku dareka no no oto Fu Fu tari de sugoshita h h eya de Me o tojita mama kan gaete ta Warui no wa dareda dareda , wakannai yo Dare no s no s ei demo nai ei demo nai , tabun Bokura wa wa nankai datte k k itto Sou nan-nen datte kitto Sa yonara to t omoni o waru dake na n da Shikat Shikat a ga nai yo k k itto "Okae ri" Omowa zu kobore ta kotoba w a chigau na    Hi Hi tori de mukaeta as as a ni Fu Fu to omou dareka no no koto Fu Fu tari de sugoshita h h ibi no At arimae ga mada nokot te i ru Warui no wa kimi d d a, soudak soudak ke Warui no wa boku da da , tabun Kore mo taishuu-teki ren ai deshou Sore wa saishuu-tekina k k otae da yo Bokura dandan to zurete itta no Sore mo tada yoku aru kik kik i nareta sutorii sutorii da An nani ka ka gayaite it it a hibi ni sura Ho kori wa tsu motte iku n da Bokura wa wa nankai datte k k itto Sou nan-nen datte kitto Sa Sa yonara ni tsudzuku m ichi o aru ku n da Shik Shik ata ga nai yo kitto "Okae ri" Its umo no you ni kobo re ochita        Wakari Wakari aenai koto nante sa Ikura Ikura de mo aru nda kitto Sube te o yurus hi aeru wake jan aika ra Tada, Tada, yasashi-sa no hib hib i o Tsurai hibi to kanjite shi matta nona ra Modorenai ka ka ra Bokura w w a nankai datte k k itto Bokura w w a nankai datte k k itto Sou nan-nen datte k k itto Sa Sa yonara to tomoni o waru dake na n da Shik Shik ata ga nai yo k k itto "Okae ri" Omowa zu kobore ta kotoba wa chigau n a Soredemo Soredemo nankai datte k k itto Sou nan-nen datte k k itto Ha Ha jimari ni modoru ko to ga deki tana ra Nant Nant e, omotte s s himau yo "Okae ri" Todoka zu kobore ta kotoba n i waratta Sukos Sukos hi hieta hieta asada
